skills.title: Front-End
skills.description: I specialize in front-end development, possessing a wealth of experience and proficiency in crafting immersive user interfaces and engaging user experiences.Complemented by frameworks like React, React-native and Vue.js. Leveraging a keen eye for design and a commitment to user-centric functionality, I excel in translating ideas into intuitive, visually compelling web applications that captivate and resonate with users.

skills.title: Back-End
skills.description: My expertise lies in back-end development, where I excel in architecting robust, scalable, and efficient systems that powers applications. Proficient in latest programming languages, I specialize in designing and implementing complex databases, APIs, and server-side logic. My skill set includes, ensuring security measures, and integrating with front-end systems etc.

skills.title: Wordpress
skills.description: Proficient in WordPress, I specialize in creating dynamic, visually striking websites. My expertise spans theme and plugin customization, ensuring tailored solutions for various needs, including e-commerce, blogs, and corporate sites. With a deep understanding of WordPress architecture, my focus remains on delivering high-quality, user-centric experiences that exceed expectations.

skills.title: Webflow Development
skills.description: Skilled in Webflow development, I excel in crafting visually compelling and responsive websites. Proficient in leveraging Webflow's tools and interface, I create seamless, custom designs while ensuring optimal functionality. My expertise extends to delivering user-friendly experiences, employing robust integrations, and prioritizing efficient project workflows.

skills.title: Ecommerce
skills.description: Specializing in e-commerce development, I adeptly create robust online platforms. My expertise spans crafting user-friendly interfaces, integrating secure payment gateways, and optimizing for seamless transactions. I excel in implementing scalable solutions, customizing functionalities, and ensuring a compelling user experience that drives conversions and business growth.

skills.title: Restfull APIs
skills.description: Proficient in RESTful API development, I excel in architecting and implementing robust interfaces for seamless data exchange. With expertise in creating scalable endpoints, authentication methods, and documentation, I prioritize efficiency and reliability. My focus lies in delivering well-structured, secure APIs that facilitate smooth communication between diverse systems.
